metadata.description: The VM Name in Azure that you want to deploy
The Host Name on OS level that you want to deploy
The type of the operating system you want to deploy.
Password or ssh key for the Virtual Machine.
The size of the HANA System you want to deploy.
Resource group of the disk encryption set
The id of the subnet you want to use.
Zone number. Set to 0 if you do not want to use Availability Zones
Name of the storage account for boot diagnostics
URL of the disk configuration script
